title: Do The Oscars Need A 'Popular' Category? - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 08.09.18
description:
Get a trial month of Hims for $5 at http://forhims.com/kfms

Get 15% off your first pair at http://meundies.com/morning.

Tim and Nick talk about Disney Princesses, the Silver and Black movie(s), and the controversy surrounding the new ‘popular’ category in the Academy Awards.

-X-men dark Phoenix will undergo reshoots, three-month rumors inaccurate (14:08 mins)
-See the Disney princesses new outfits in ralph breaks the interent (16:17 mins)
-Silver & Black halted at Sony will be split into separate movies (22:08 mins)
-James Gunn might still have a future with Disney and Marvel (29:35 mins)
-Slaughterhouse Rulez trailer (35:57 mins)
-Tessa Thompsons Thor Ragnarok wig had an astronomical price tag (39:20 mins)
-Hollywood hits back at new Oscars popular film catagory (41:21 mins)

Thanks to https://www.twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
